markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5112) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 223 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=218), [Spellshot](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=122) (Level 12)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5109); Master in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You gain the expert [spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132).

<title level="2">Expert Wizard Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Beast Gunner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3234), [Master Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5113)
name: Expert Wizard Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Wizard Spellcasting; Master in Arcana
